name: Cyan Runner
description:
Cyan runner is a minimalist atmospheric arcade game. Help Cyan survive as long as possible in this endless corridor.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

#NEWS 04/08/2017: Version 0.6 is out

Version 0.6 upgrades:

- New obstacles

- New menus & HUD

- Difficulty fixed

- Bugs fixed

- New stage: Boss stage! Survive the attack of the knight, but be carefull, he can come back anytime...

- And bla bla bla... all the things developers say in this kind of notes. Have fun!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

#NEWS 03/02/2017: Version 0.4 is out

Version 0.4 upgrades:

- power ups

-new huds

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

#NEWS 07/12/2016: Version 0.3 is out

Version 0.3 upgrades:

- Web functionalities
- Skins system
- Visual upgrades
- New level: Shooter mode (Still in progress)
- Since now the game will notify you when a new version is available (Detailed information will be available in our Facebook page)

Install instructions
  1. Extract the contents of the .zip-file
  2. open folder game and run Cyan runner.exe
  3. for windows 7 use version win32
